text: Welcome to Petra here in Jordan
We are at the ancient Roman city of Jerash
So we finally made it here to the Dead Sea

in Jordan
and the thing to do here is actually get this

mud
and cover your body in the mud it's great

for your skin
it's great antioxidants

it does a lot of great things for you
so let's go give it a try

I'm thoroughly baked now fresh out of the
oven

ready to head into the Dead Sea
and float away my troubles

Behind me are the Seven Pillars of Wisdom
here in Wadi Rum

named by Lawrence of Arabia
because this is where he started
